Function.body: CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` FUNCTION `CharSplitFnc`( vSource VARCHAR(8000), vDelim CHAR(1), vPos INT ) RETURNS varchar(8000) CHARSET utf8mb3 COMMENT '문자열 자르기 함수' RETURN REPLACE(SUBSTRING(SUBSTRING_INDEX(vSource, vDelim, vPos), CHAR_LENGTH(SUBSTRING_INDEX(vSource, vDelim, vPos - 1)) + 1), vDelim, '')
